Title: The term hints is not translated on the relevant language in the Lessons card screen after tapping on the term hint
Precondition: STR: 1. The app is installed  2. The app is launched 3. Any language (except  EN, RU, ESP) is selected 4. The 'Learning' section is opened
Steps: STR: 1. Tap on the [Start learning] button 2. Tap on the [Turn on hints] button 3. Tap on the 'term hint'
Expected Result: The term hints is translated on the relevant language
Actual Result: The term hints is not translated on the relevant language
